meanings.sent1: The enhanced flavor of the cake made it irresistible.
meanings.sent2: The new software update enhanced the performance of the computer.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's enhanced strength allowed him to lift a car effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an enhanced version of sunshine, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The enhanced colors of the sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking display.

meanings.definition: Made greater in value or effectiveness
meanings.sent1: The enhanced features of the phone made it more desirable.
meanings.sent2: The enhanced security measures protected the building from intruders.
meanings.sent3: The detective's enhanced skills helped him solve the case in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like an enhanced shield, deflecting any negativity.
meanings.sent5: The enhanced sound system filled the room with crystal-clear music.

meanings.sent1: The enhanced soil produced bountiful crops in the farm.
meanings.sent2: The enhanced curriculum provided students with a well-rounded education.
meanings.sent3: The magician's enhanced hat seemed to produce endless rabbits.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like an enhanced potion, spreading warmth to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The enhanced flavors of the dish delighted the taste buds of the guests.
